ing: 1 (3 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
des: "Instant pudding and instant whipped topping mix make this a creamy, versatile icing that takes minutes to make.   Substitute any pudding flavor for the vanilla."
ins: In a large bowl, stir together whipped topping mix, pudding mix and milk.  Using an electric mixer, beat on high speed for 15 minutes, or until icing is of spreading consistency.  Chill until ready to use.
